mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee_stack (employee_id, stack_id, stack_acquistion, created_at) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{employeeStack.stackId}, #{employeeStack.stackAcquistion}, NOW())
mapper.select: select es.ID ,es.EMPLOYEE_ID ,es.STACK_ID ,sm.STACK_NAME ,es.STACK_ACQUISTION from EMPLOYEE_STACK es inner join STACK_MASTER sm on es.STACK_ID = sm.ID where es.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
